author: eae
msg: UIMA-1228 Apply Burn's patches: UIMA-1228.patch and UIMA-1228-test.patch

author: kwsutter
msg: OPENJPA-767.  Change which classloader gets used for loading the OpenJPA runtime classes in a container environment.  Previous to this change, we were using the classloader provided to us via the PersistenceUnitInfo.  But, this wasn't sufficient in an OSGi-container environment.  Initial tests show that using the classloader of the PersistenceProviderImpl is working better...  More testing and experimentation required...

author: bodewig
msg: Make prefix separator configurable, nest prefixes in include

msg: Now Portlet Application Manager will have refresh button to reload tree, with out logging out.
